brief_title: Elsamitrucin (SPI 28090) for Relapsed or Refractory Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma
brief_summary: To determine the safety and efficacy of elsamitrucin in patients with relapsed or refractory non-Hodgkin's lymphoma (NHL). To determine if elsamitrucin is efficacious in a particular pathologic NHL subtype(s).
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Relapsed or Refractory mantle cell lymphoma and/or CLL/SLL except Burkitt's, Burkitt's like or HIV-associated lymphoma - at least one prior cytotoxic chemotherapy regimens - measurable disease - adequate bone marrow, liver and kidney function - ECOG PS 0-2 Exclusion Criteria: - prior treatment with elsamitrucin - prior chemo, antibody or radiotherapy for NHL within 28 days prior to start to treatment - HIV positive or known AIDS syndrome - uncontrolled medical disease or psychiatric condition/s
